publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5816 Stuart McMillan: Congratulations to Greenock Wanderers RFC—That the Parliament congratulates Greenock Wanderers RFC on winning the Scottish Hydro Electric National League Division Two title and, in doing so, gaining promotion to Division One; notes that Greenock Wanderers RFC is the first national club to gain promotion this season and has done so with three matches remaining; considers Greenock Wanderers RFC’s emphasis on fostering local talent as being a key factor in its success, and wishes the team all the best for next season in Division One. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Bob Doris*, Anne McLaughlin*

S3M-5816 Stuart McMillan: Congratulations to Greenock Wanderers RFC—That the Parliament congratulates Greenock Wanderers RFC on winning the Scottish Hydro Electric National League Division Two title and, in doing so, gaining promotion to Division One; notes that Greenock Wanderers RFC is the first national club to gain promotion this season and has done so with three matches remaining; considers Greenock Wanderers RFC’s emphasis on fostering local talent as being a key factor in its success, and wishes the team all the best for next season in Division One. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Bob Doris, Anne McLaughlin
